issue.title: [CF 1166] Monitor "snapshoted" Bleeds
issue.body:
Let me preface this by saying that TMW works wonders for me and i can`t imagine playing the game without this addon anymore :)
I know this suggestion already came up a while ago, but i couldn`t find it anymore and don`t know if this was taken care of or if it was declined for some reason.

I would really like to have a feature in TMW that gives me a way to distinguish between snapshoted bleeds and "normal" applied bleeds.
As far as i know, there is currently no way to monitor feral bleeds that are improved due to bloodtalons or tigers fury for example.

Thanks for reading this and i would very much appreciate your feedback on this issue. :)


> Posted by CurseForge user KingZer081 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1166 | Raw
